discourse_list.title: Tool House Rock #4 | Wonderverse | - Tuesday, March 21, 2023 @ 4:00 PM UTC

content.content: Tool House Rock #4 | Wonderverse | Tuesday, March 21 @ 4:00 PM UTC  Join us on Tuesday 21-Mar for another session of Tool House Rock! For this episode, we will host the Cofounder and Head of Partnerships from Wonderverse to explore this platform’s collaborative capabilities for project building.  Problem Space Maintaining project collaboration amongst different groups in a DAO can be a challenge due to it’s decentralized nature. The completion of Pregame and Endgame requires input from multiple teams within Maker; dependent on each team’s own unique abilities. Current collaboration interfaces focus more on social interactions, rather than project building. These existing interfaces also tend to stand alone and have limited integrations with other software platforms.  What is Wonderverse? Wonderverse is an interface software that coordinates workflow for decentralized teams. It is a proactive hub that can integrate with other source types and people could yield higher productivity and saved time for core unit facilitators.  Within the software, one is able to:  Prioritize and manage multiple projects. Interface with commonly used tools such as Discord and Notion. Configure token transactions with multiple wallets. Initiate and manage on-chain voting. Access web3 features such as token gating. Enable contributors to build and share a native web3 resume.   Our guests are…  Wonderverse’s Cofounder - Andros  Wonderverse’s Head of Partnerships - Ed    Session hosted by…   @Juan  &  @Retro &     Agenda  Introduction of the problem space Product solution Demonstration Scope Relevancy in Endgame Q&A   Join Us! If you can’t make this call, post any questions you may have for our guest on this post, and our hosts will ask them during the Q&A.  When  Add this call to your personal calendar. Time in your local-timezone format: 2023-03-21T16:00:00Z  Where Zoom Link  here Attn: @Core-Facilitators, @Recognized-Delegates
